channel.title: RuneHelper
channel.description:
Hello, my friend and a mate of his have started developing a new program called "RuneHelper" and i wish to help advertise their program in order to support my friends. It is currently under construction. The program will be free, and donations are accepted. What RuneHelper will be is a Runescape client similar to SwiftKit, but more updates and calculators etc. The client will also be pretty "fancy" and it already has a pretty good gui.
Beta pictures: [img]http://a6.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/292505_310404559045537_1304050706_n.jpg[/img] This is the launcher, the client is only 20% done, and i cannot post any pictures atm. I will post again the progress of the program, but for now you'll have to wait. Thanks for reading :)
Also check their Youtube channel at: [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/RuneHelperYT]http://www.youtube.com/user/RuneHelperYT[/url] for updates.
